name: 2017 International Symposium on Business and Social Sciences
content: Dear Sir/Madam Greeting from 2017 International Symposium on Business and Social Sciences (2017 ISBASS) Please add the following information on your webpage for advertisement of conference. Name of conference: 2017 International Symposium on Business and Social Sciences (2017 ISBASS) Date(s) of conference: June 6-8, 2017 Full location details: Kitakyushu, Japan Key dates (registration, abstract submission etc): Abstract/Paper Submission Deadline February 25, 2017 Notification of Acceptance March 15, 2017 Final Abstract/ Full Paper Submission Deadline March 25, 2017 Registration Deadline April 5, 2017 Conference Date June 6-8, 2017 Website link: http://www.isbass.org/ Contact details: isbass@isbass.org Organized by Higher Education Forum 12-1F.,No.129,Sec.1,Fuxing S.Rd.,Taipei,Taiwan http://www.prohef.org/ Tel:+886227401498 Fax:+886227522642 Courtyard By AIM3F 3-8-1 Asano, Kokurakita-ku, Kitakyushu-shi, Fukuoka 802-0001 JAPAN
